title: NEFT records 4.1 cr transactions on Feb 29, highest single-day volume
description: The NEFT recorded its highest ever single-day transactions on February 29, with 4.10 crore transactions processed. NEFT and RTGS have seen significant growth in volume and value. NEFT operates on a 24/7 basis, 365 days a year since December 16, 2019, while RTGS achieved this from December 14, 2020. NEFT settles retail payments and RTGS settles wholesale payments.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
